description: Delete a tender job schedule shift.
permissions: Requires authentication. Allowed for admins, customer managers for the job customer/broker branch, broker-shift trucker managers, drivers/shift drivers on the shift, or foremen per TenderJobScheduleShiftPolicy#destroy?
side_effects: Deletes the tender job schedule shift record.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. --confirm is required and must be true.
